title: Binance-Nigeria Brawl Continues As Country Asks Exchange to Submit List of Top 100 Users
description: Nigeria wants Binance to give information regarding its top 100 users in the country and all transaction history spanning the past six months, the Financial Times reported on Tuesday.

title: Coinbase Plans To Raise $1B Through Convertible Debt Offering
description: By raising capital through convertible convertible bonds, Coinbase can avoid any adverse impact on its stock price.

title: Can AI Integration Enhance User Engagement in Online Gambling?
description: Within the dynamic realm of online gambling, the integration of Artificial Intelligence (AI) signifies a significant milestone, showcasing the transformative potential of AI integration in shaping the industry’s landscape. This convergence of technology and entertainment has sparked a wave of innovations, promising unparalleled user experiences while igniting debates about the ethical implications of AI-driven gambling […]

title: Binance bolsters web3 trust through law enforcement workshop in Taiwan
description: In a move aimed at bolstering ties with law enforcement in handling crypto-related crimes, Binance conducted a virtual assets law enforcement workshop for the officers of the Keelung District Prosecutors Office in Taiwan. The event, announced on March 13, reflects…

title: INJ hits new all-time high as whale activity doubles
description: Injective (INJ) has recorded impressive gains since December 2023 and recently touched a new all-time high (ATH). INJ is up by 15% in the past 24 hours and is trading at $48.8 at the time of writing. The asset reached…

title: Coinbase’s $1B Bond Sale Strategy: Following in Michael Saylor’s Footsteps to Safeguard Stock Investor Interests
description: Coinbase announces a $1 billion convertible bond sale to bolster growth without diluting shareholder equity. Innovative “negotiated capped call transactions” are introduced to minimize equity dilution, reflecting confidence in the cryptocurrency market. In a strategic financial move, Coinbase announced its plan to offer $1 billion in Convertible Senior Notes by 2030 to qualified institutional buyers. [...]

title: Unveiling the Future: Nominations Open for Global Blockchain Awards Recognizing Web3 Excellence!
description:
VAP Group is proud to announce the launch of the Global Blockchain Awards, honoring the brightest minds and boldest innovators in the Web3 space. Set against the backdrop of the esteemed Global Blockchain Show, this exclusive awards ceremony will take place on April 15, 2024, at the Grand Hyatt Dubai, preceding the main event scheduled […]
